package pattern;

public class Pattern4 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int k=1;
		int f=4;
		for(int i=1; i<=5; i++)
		{
			for(int s =1; s<=f; s++)
			{
				System.out.print(" ");	
			}
			for(int j=1;j<=k; j++)
			{
				System.out.print("*");
			}
			System.out.println();
			k++;
			f--;
		}
	}

	}
